flawed_nl_solution:
The sum of the bills of the family in the first 4 months is $30/month x 4 months = $<<30*4=210>>210.
The sum of the bills of the family in the last 2 months is $24/month x $2 = $<<24*2=48>>48.
The sum of the bills of the family over the 6 months is $210 + $48 = $<<210+48=258>>258.
Hence, their average monthly bill is $258/6 months = $<<258/6=43>>43/month.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 120, not 210. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
